resources.string: All your banking\nneeds in one app
Do’s and dont’s of safe banking
Never share your password or Card details with anyone

1. As Introduction of charges for cash deposit in Cash Acceptor/Recycler Machines on bank holidays and post banking hours on working days with effect from Nov 01, 2020. Click here to know more.

2. The ICICI Bank and Ferrari S.p.A partnership is coming to a close and hence, we will be discontinuing the Ferrari Credit Card programme. As a result of this development, there will be no renewal card issued against your card.

3. As Introduction of charges for cash deposit in Cash Acceptor/Recycler Machines on bank holidays and post banking hours on working days with effect from Nov 01, 2020. Click here to know more.

4. As Introduction of charges for cash deposit in Cash Acceptor/Recycler Machines on bank holidays and post banking hours on working days with effect from Nov 01, 2020. Click here to know more.

5. As Introduction of charges for cash deposit in Cash Acceptor/Recycler Machines on bank holidays and post banking hours on working days with effect from Nov 01, 2020. Click here to know more.
Get quick tips on precautionary measures to identify the potential threats
Let’s get started with your fund transfer
How often would you transfer funds to this payee?
Multiple times - easily transfer in the future
Just in time - It does not require adding the payee
Verify payee details to ensure\nthe safety of your fund transfer
Maximum transfer limit is up to ₹5,000

"1. As per the RBI circular dated Oct 14, 2010, transfer of funds through electronic mode will be executed only on the basis of the account number of the beneficiary while initiating the transaction, name will not be considered as a criteria for providing credit. Kindly ensure that you enter the correct beneficiary account number.
 2. The Funds Transfer limit per transaction is Rs 10,000.
 3. ICICI Bank is not responsible for
Funds transferred to any unintended recipient.
Retrieval of funds transferred to any unauthorised recipient.
Charges/commission of any kind levied / charged by the payee's bank.
 4. ICICI Bank has the most comprehensive security standards in place to protect your interests. At the same time, we expect you to
 follow safe practices while using the Internet Banking channel. You are fully responsible for protecting your Internet Banking User ID and Passwords. ICICI Bank will not be liable for any loss that you may incur owing to unauthorised access into your account.
 5. In case you are re-trying , please check the status of your previous payment first.
6. Allowed special characters in remarks field are- _()[]@$.?,':;/\+space"

Please do not share OTP with anyone, even if a person claims to be an ICICI Bank official.
